title: Herbal medicinal products: scientific guidelines - European Medicines Agency
author: EMA; COMM; DG; UNIT
cleaned_text: Herbal medicinal products: scientific guidelines The European Medicines Agency's scientific guidelines on herbal medicinal products help medicine developers prepare marketing-authorisation applications for human and veterinary medicines. Use the links below to find guidelines that are specifically related to [herbal medicinal products](/en/human-regulatory/herbal-medicinal-products): For a complete list of scientific guidelines currently open for consultation, see [Public consultations](/en/news-events/open-consultations).
